page.title: 13Recreation In Gunton
page.content: Recreation is found in the nearby villages,towns or Norwich 18 miles away. The annual agricultural show in Blickling park on August bank Holiday Monday attracts a huge number of local people,as does the Royal Norfolk show in June. Some of the local farmers exhibit their livestock at these shows. There are mens clubs in nearby village halls,where competitive darts, billiards and bowls are played. Whist Drives,Discos,Bingo and parties are organised during the winter. There are Womens Institutes and Old People's Clubs in easy reach of the area. Most of those living within the park do so due to the recreational amenities available. There are many roads and paths free of traffic for cycling, jogging,horse riding and walking and for nature lovers etc. There is good fishing and an annual hunt meet.
